attributes.action: Restore morning assembly to all schools in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is proposed that the government make morning assembly compulsory for all 3 to 16 year old schol children.
It is vital that young people be allowed to develop the spiritual element of their being.
The inward realisation that we are all one is the key to a harmonious world.
It is proposed that schools which already have a morning assembly are not interfered with.
(There are many roads to god)
For schools with pupils of many religions, it is proposed that the assembly should take the form of a spiritual gathering with no teaching of any one religion.
All religions share many basic teachings.
(it can never be wrong to teach love and respect)
It is proposed that the form and content of the assembly be determined by the heads and staff of each school.
Every school will have a wealth of spiritual interests to draw from within its staff.(egs.yoga, good breathing technique,  relaxation techniques, an awareness of the joy which charitable works can bring etc)
The ending of the gatherings should consist of a mutual blessing 
eg May the long time sun shine upon you
All love surround you
And the white light within you 
Guide your way on
